definition: hidden from view/alternately hidden and visible/setting off each other
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)

sentences.english: My house is among the hills.
sentences.chinese: 我的房子掩映在小山之中。

sentences.english: He saw only her long chestnut lashes , permeated with shadow and modesty.
sentences.chinese: 他只见到栗色的长睫毛，掩映着幽娴贞静的神态。

sentences.english: Sunlight Rock and western-style houses hidden in the lush greenery on Gulangyu Islet, a tiny island off the coast of Xiamen, were faintly visible.
sentences.chinese: 阳光下的鼓浪屿，日光岩和绿林掩映的洋房依稀可见。

sentences.english: Wangjiang stage is placed in the Green shadow of the bamboo sea.
sentences.chinese: 望江台掩映在这翠竹绿影中。

sentences.english: A rich straw-yellow color with gold reflections.
sentences.chinese: 丰润的稻黄色酒体掩映出金色光芒。

sentences.english: I stood in the songs of childhood Yin, the backdrop of the poetry.
sentences.chinese: 我的童年矗立在歌吟里，掩映在诗词中。

sentences.english: This wine shows a straw-yellow color, with golden hues.
sentences.chinese: 淡雅的稻黄色酒体掩映出亮绿色边缘，优雅迷人。

sentences.english: These scattered pieces in my blog cover or show some bright happiness and sadness.
sentences.chinese: 这些细碎的文字掩映出些许灿烂的幸福和明媚的忧伤。

sentences.english: The famous cannes multiplex is set in the edge of coconut trees.
sentences.chinese: 著名的戛纳电影城就掩映在海岸线边的椰树下。

sentences.english: Along the route, villages shelter in the deeply fissured shoreline.
sentences.chinese: 沿途，村落掩映在深深裂开的海岸线上。

sentences.english: The pink peaches and green willows set each other off.
The magnolia trees, blossoming on the green, looked positively inflamed.
sentences.chinese: 在绿叶掩映下盛开的玉兰树，看上去就像着了火。

sentences.english: Below his feet was the blue and green globe, lush with life.
sentences.chinese: 他的脚下是蓝绿掩映的星球，生机盎然。

sentences.english: See Europe from the plane, city and dorp set off one another in the ocean in green.
sentences.chinese: 从飞机上看欧洲，城市和村落掩映在绿色的海洋中。

sentences.english: A cottage that suggests a garden stands among trees .
sentences.chinese: 像花园一样的小屋掩映在树林中。

sentences.english: Deep amber with green gold tinges . The nose is complex and fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 深沉的琥珀色泽掩映出一抹亮绿和金黄色泽。

definition: verdant/lush green and full of life
evergreen pine and cypress (idiom); steadfast nobility
in picturesque disorder (idiom); irregular arrangement with charming effect
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
